sections.text:
29-4117.Legislative intent.

It is the intent of the Legislature that wrongfully convicted persons have an opportunity to establish their innocence through deoxyribonucleic acid, DNA, testing.

SourceLaws 2001, LB 659, ยง 2.

Annotations

The DNA Testing Act is a limited remedy providing inmates an opportunity to obtain DNA testing in order to establish innocence after a conviction. State v. Myers, 304 Neb. 789, 937 N.W.2d 181 (2020).
